title: Eco Molding Introduces Injection Mould Service for Various Industries
text: Eco Molding Introduces Injection Mould Service for Various Industries China based Eco Molding Co. Limited specializes in plastic molding services and they are now introducing their services for various industries, including automotive, electronics, home appliances as well as general industrial applications and others. USA, 30 September 2015 -- With more than 15 years of experience in the plastic injection molding sector, Eco Molding Company can now offer design, engineering and injection molding services to different industries. The company has the tools and equipments to help deliver precise injection moulds that can meet the specific requirements of various industries. The company is the leading plastic injection molding manufacturer that focuses on custom injection molding. With a range of high-efficiency CNC machines and EDM machines, they manufacture high quality plastic parts for various industrial applications. They have a well-equipped injection molding facility for manufacturing a variety of products. The product range includes spoons, iPhone cases, CD covers, handle covers, bottle carriers, door holders, lens, and a host of other products. All products feature precise engineering and are meant for a long-lasting durability.The spokesperson of the company reveals that they believe in custom injection mould service and this is the reason why they have an increasing client base across the world. Moreover, they endeavor to provide one-stop services for small and mid-size companies, besides large scale enterprises as well. “We are very popular among small scale industries for our cost-effective production capabilities,” the spokesperson states. Besides, they aim at delivering timely services that aid in the growth and prosperity of the client companies. Eco Molding offers plastic injection moulds for different industries and they are always available to answer client queries. “For any type of query, for quotations or for a custom product development, clients can contact us , and we will be happy to assist them in every possible manner”, the spokesperson states again. The China based company has a team of customer support executives to answer to the queries of the clients. They also have experienced technicians, R&D professionals and others who contribute to the innovative product developments of the company. The company builds molds in different brands, such as DME, Mold Master, Yudo, Husky and others. For any custom mold production needs, one may visit their website http://www.ecomolding.com/ . # # # About Eco Molding Co. Limited: Eco molding offers plastic injection molding service and specializes in various plastic moulds for automotive, home appliances, electronics as well as general industrial OEM applications. The company covers an area of more than 2000 square meters, surrounded with convenient transportation. At present, they have more than 100 employees and capital assets over 8 million RMB. The company has the capacity 40-50 sets of moulds per month. Media Contacts:
